thread.title: New photos show aftermath of deadly US cinema shooting
thread.title_full: New photos show aftermath of deadly US cinema shooting | News24

author: news24.com
title: New photos show aftermath of deadly US cinema shooting
text:
Centennial - Prosecutors have released new photos taken in the chaotic aftermath of the Colorado cinema shooting, including pictures of the auditorium where James Holmes killed 12 people.
The images, which prosecutors released in response to open-records requests, also show the elaborate homemade explosives in Holmes' apartment, which he had rigged into a potentially deadly booby trap.
The hundreds of photos include images of the three guns Holmes used in the July 20, 2012, shooting and his car, where he dressed head-to-toe in body armour before slipping into the packed movie theatre. More than 70 others were injured.
Prosecutors showed most of the photos to jurors during Holmes' four-month trial.
